%text Degrees and radians are not the only units for measuring angles.
But they are the most common ones.
\underline\text{Two right angles} $= 180^\circ = \pi$ radians.
Hence, \[\qquad x^\circ = \left(\frac{x}{180}\right)\cdot\pi\text{ radians} \]
Conversely, \[ \qquad y\text{ radians} = \left( \frac{y}\pi\right)\cdot 180^\circ\] %
